alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 26 at 9:01AM CDT until further notice by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Nebraska... Platte River near Darr affecting Dawson County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Platte River near Darr. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, flooding of the low lying land right along the river can be expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 10.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM CDT Monday was 10.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain at a crest of 10.7 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.7 feet on 07/09/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
